entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
